output: Actual status code : '200' matches with expected status code : '200'

steps.name: Response should contain value "1.0" for "GBP"

steps.name: Response should contain not null values for "INR,AUD"

result.error_message:

elements.name: Validate that API returns data for today when queried for a future date

steps.name: API is hit with end point as "2020-06-03" "base" "EUR"

output: Actual status code : '200' matches with expected status code : '200'
steps.name: API Should respond with status code as "200"

result.error_message:
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<202[1-01-1]3> but was:<202[0-06-0]3>
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:117)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:146)
	at stepDefinitions.ExchangeRatesAPITesting.Response_should_contain_expected_date(ExchangeRatesAPITesting.java:136)
	at ✽.Response should contain date as "Today"(file:src/test/resources/features/ExchangeRates.feature:63)

steps.name: Response should contain date as "Today"
Response for future date should match with response for today
Response should contain not null values for "NZD,INR"
